name: Alien Bush Wars
description:
Assets are used from GMS:2 and I followed the tutorial with a few additions that I thought would make the game more enjoyable to play.

Additions are:

> Stamina/Energy bar

>Health bar

>Collisions

>Enemy Proximity

>Several menus (Instructions, credits)

>Larger map with walls

>Title music/Game Music

If you would like the Game Maker file so you can look at the code, pop me a message and I will happily share it.
